extension.description: A plugin to insert the aiContactSafe form in an article. Use it like this : {aicontactsafeform pf=1|use_css=1|aics_name=default name|field2_name=value field2}. "pf=1" will set the profile with the id 1. "use_css=1" will activate the profile css. "aics_name=default name" will set the default value of the field aics_name to "default name". You can use here all the fields defined in aiContactSafe.
